statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -6 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -13 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -6 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -13 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
